name: Crashbots
description: Take control of the latest line of robots and test their fighting capabilities, agility, and endurance in various arenas filled with dangerous obstacles, booby traps and enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Graphics: 2048MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
